FuncDef: The recording-scheme command creates a recording scheme and displays the recording scheme view. The undo recording-scheme command deletes a recording scheme. By default, no recording scheme is configured on the device.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a recording scheme.
The value is a string of 1 to 32 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces or the following symbols: / \ : * ? " < > |. The value cannot be - or --.

ExtraInfo: After a recording scheme takes effect, you can view the records such as the executed commands, connection information, and system-level events on the recording server. The records help you locate network faults. Because a recording scheme needs to be associated with an HWTACACS server template, the recording scheme is configured only when HWTACACS authentication or authorization is performed.
